{{Description|Dear Travelers,<br>Today, Paimon has a new anniversary event for you - "Let's Solve Word Puzzles"!}}
'''Let's Solve Word Puzzles''' is a [[Web Event]] in [[Version 2.1]]. It is part of the [[One Year Anniversary Community Event]]s.

==Event Duration==
Event Period: October 7–13, 2021 23:59 (UTC+8)
Results: October 18

==How to Participate==
# Guess the answer to the puzzle according to the clues in the picture and fill in the characters in the picture, then post it to your profile with the tags #PaimonsWordPuzzles and #GenshinImpact (please make sure that both your post and personal account are public)
# Use the link below to fill in your UID and the URL of the puzzle card posted on your profile, and Paimon will randomly select 1,000 correctly filled puzzle cards and send each of the winners a prize of 100 Primogems via in-game mail. https://forms.gle/PmZMSCWQhkG7wH4G7

[[File:Let's Solve Word Puzzles Puzzle.png|600px]]

==Rewards==
{{Item|Primogem|24|x=100}} (1,000 winners)

==Event Rules==
# Travelers must be Adventure Rank 10 or higher on the Europe, America, Asia, or TW/HK/MO servers.
# The publishing of content that violates laws, regulations, or social platforms' terms of use is prohibited.
# Publishing content not related to the event, including but not limited to advertisement links and other means of publicity, is prohibited.
# Each Traveler can only participate in the event once.
# The copyright of posted works belongs to their respective creators. Plagiarism, misappropriation, and other actions that violate others' copyright are strictly prohibited.
# There are 1,000 prizes for this event in total for all participating platforms.
